# Origin
Mandible, Alveolar process of maxilla and mandible, Pterygomandibular raphe @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion
Angle of mouth, Orbicularis Oris @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation

[Facial Nerve CN VII]({{< var ref-cn7.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action
**BIL**: Presses cheek against molar teeth, working with tongue to keep food between occlusal surfaces and out of oral vestibule; expels air from oral cavity/resists distension when blowing; **UNIL**: Draws mouth to one side @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
